alert.note: Alert for Towns; Union (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 10:58PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Towns and northeastern Union Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1058 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Hayesville to Alexanders Mill to near Blairsville, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Hiawassee, Young Harris, Brasstown Bald, Track Rock, Tate City, Gumlog, Macedonia, Plum Orchard Gap Shelter, Titus, Mountain Scene and Alexanders Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
